control_attributes.control_description: The information system establishes a trusted communications path between the user and the following security functions of the system: [Assignment: organization-defined security functions to include at a minimum, information system authentication and re-authentication].
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system provides physical disconnect of collaborative computing devices in a manner that supports ease of use.
